results.title: Simvastatin treatment showed no prophylactic effect in influenza virus-infected mice.
results.text_hl: Surprisingly, treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ resulted in lower survival rates and in more distinct @<m>DISEASE_MASS_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536030 @@@body mass loss@@@ in comparison to virus-@DISEASE_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infected@@@ control @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Glück B, Schmidtke M, Walther M, Meerbach A, Wutzler P. Simvastatin treatment showed no prophylactic effect in influenza virus-infected mice. J Med Virol. 2013 Nov;85(11):1978-82. PMID: 23926054
